name: [Ludum Dare 46] A Call From Galactic Command
name_original: [Ludum Dare 46] A Call From Galactic Command
description:
[Ludum Dare 46] A Call From Galactic Command is a game developed by P1x3lc0w. It was originally released in 2020.
[Ludum Dare 46] A Call From Galactic Command is available on PC and Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
